mapper.insert: insert into i_me_favorite_club ( member_id, club_id, i_member_sort_by_favorite, announcement_announced_day_before_flg, starting_member_announced_flg, game_started_flg, goal_flg, warning_flg, change_flg, first_half_finished_flg, game_finished_flg, regist_datetime, update_datetime ) values ( #{memberId}, #{clubId}, #{iMemberSortByFavorite}, #{announcementAnnouncedDayBeforeFlg}, #{startingMemberAnnouncedFlg}, #{gameStartedFlg}, #{goalFlg}, #{warningFlg}, #{changeFlg}, #{firstHalfFinishedFlg}, #{gameFinishedFlg}, #{registDatetime}, #{updateDatetime} )
mapper.update: update i_me_favorite_club set club_id = #{clubId}, i_member_sort_by_favorite = #{iMemberSortByFavorite}, announcement_announced_day_before_flg = #{announcementAnnouncedDayBeforeFlg}, starting_member_announced_flg = #{startingMemberAnnouncedFlg}, game_started_flg = #{gameStartedFlg}, goal_flg = #{goalFlg}, warning_flg = #{warningFlg}, change_flg = #{changeFlg}, first_half_finished_flg = #{firstHalfFinishedFlg}, game_finished_flg = #{gameFinishedFlg}, regist_datetime = #{registDatetime}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime} where member_id = #{memberId} and club_id = #{clubId}

update i_me_favorite_club set club_id = #{clubId}, announcement_announced_day_before_flg = #{announcementAnnouncedDayBeforeFlg}, game_started_flg = #{gameStartedFlg}, goal_flg = #{goalFlg}, warning_flg = #{warningFlg}, first_half_finished_flg = #{firstHalfFinishedFlg}, game_finished_flg = #{gameFinishedFlg}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime} where member_id = #{memberId} and club_id = #{clubId}
